short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide merch and ticket sales on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtubers can now sell merch and tickets below their videos. This is great if you want to support them, but as a real fan you've already bought everything you want. This extension allows you to hide the merch and ticket sales below videos.
